1478170.name: ARKADIANAX Demo
1478170.description:
ARKADIANAX now has an available demo!
Plug two controllers and feel the intensity!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Shoot your way through hordes of enemy ships, tanks, mine fields, wind mills, lazer beams, massive boss fights and software bugs, all in a multidimensional shoot em up like never seen before!
As pilot of the "ARKADIANAX" face both 2D and 3D enemies blended into a whirlwind of nostalgic and modern gameplay, grab items to upgrade your space ship and cannons and take down everything that gets in your way. Discover a colorful multi-dimensional world that requires your expert knowledge in arcade classics to protect and guard the universe; shoot bullets, bombs and massive fists of fury in this explosive space-age and retro-like shmup!


Features:
- Single-player and local-coop campaign - Fight with friends!
- Password enabled to boost your combat!
- Controller support - Defend from the comfort of your couch! (Analog Stick not supported)
- Intro and Outro in English and Spanish language - Viva Nostalgia!
- More than 30 unique enemies
- Original 8 bit inspired Soundtrack to motivate your journey
- Steam Achievements
- New features and upgrades, not seen in the original game!
- Oh, so many surprises- there's a decent chance you'll be surprised!



ARKADIANAX was released originally on Desura (R.I.P) and it was approved by the Steam Community (Steam Greenlight) back in 2012. Because of technical difficulties, the developer (me) was unable to sync it with the Steam’s API.
The good thing is that there are a lot of improvements in this version! (Content, bug fixing, gameplay, soundtrack and more)

Now, ARKADIANAX is ready to test you.
Are you the pilot this Universe needs??

Bring a friend, two controllers and your skills to defeat BUGATRON in this retro-themed arcade.

WARNING: This game makes use of the D-Pad in the controller.
BUGATRON doesn’t allow analog sticks in his realm for now...
